articles.description: The New England Patriots become the first team to book their spot in Super Bowl 60 after grinding out a 10-7 win at the Denver Broncos.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: New England Patriots reach Super Bowl 60 after beating Denver Broncos

articles.description: MOTD pundit Danny Murphy explains how Manchester United earned their impressive win at Premier League leaders Arsenal, and how he feels the Gunners will react.
articles.title: Danny Murphy column: 'Another unbelievable result' - what is different about Man Utd now?

articles.description: Arsenal's winless run may normally be cause for concern - but the stats suggest they are still in control of the Premier League title race.
articles.title: Why Arsenal are still Premier League title favourites despite recent wobble

articles.description: As Michael Carrick's perfect start at Manchester United continues, is he building a case for the job longer term?
articles.title: Michael Carrick makes case for Man Utd job after perfect start

articles.description: Tennis Scores and Schedule on BBC Sport, including full order of play for Wimbledon, Australian Open, US Open, French Open, ATP and WTA tour matches.
articles.title: Scores & Schedule - Tennis - BBC Sport

articles.description: Liverpool left-back Andy Robertson looks set to remain at Anfield after the Reds decide they are currently unable to proceed with a deal to sell him to Tottenham.
articles.title: Liverpool: Andy Robertson unlikely to join Tottenham during January transfer window

articles.description: Manchester City are keeping tabs on Trent Alexander-Arnold, Liverpool get positive response after approaching Xabi Alonso, Chelsea recall Aaron Anselmino from Borussia Dortmund loan, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Alexander-Arnold, Rayan, Alonso, Anselmino, Meite

articles.description: Aston Villa produce 'extraordinary' performance as they claim their first win at Newcastle since the infamous 2005 encounter
articles.title: 'Extraordinary' Villa claim first win at Newcastle since infamous 2005 trip

articles.description: Australian Maddison Inglis has gone from saving match points in qualifying to a "life-changing" meeting with Iga Swiatek in her home Grand Slam.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: 'Life-changing' Iga Swiatek match awaits Australian qualifier Maddison Inglis

articles.description: Liam Rosenior has started well at Chelsea and it bodes well for the future amid ambitions to qualify for the Champions League.
articles.title: Liam Rosenior: Chelsea manager continues positive start
